productName: Jet Set Large Top-Zip Saffiano Leather Tote

description.sectionContent: Jet setters, take note: this sophisticated, multi-tasking tote is the ultimate travel accomplice. Crafted from Saffiano—a matte leather that’s both distinctive and durable—it sports a look that’s chic yet understated. A multitude of pockets keeps you organized, while the top-zip design ensures your essentials stay put, wherever you may go.

-Saffiano Leather
 -Gold-Tone Hardware
 -Top Zip Fastening
 -100% Polyester Lining
 -Imported
